1 - select all while
while w; call c; stmt s;
Select w such that Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s)  and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s)  and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) and Follows(28, s) 
58, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 76, 78, 80, 81, 195, 207, 213, 237, 286
5000
2 - select all while
while w; stmt s;
Select w such that Follows(28, s) and Follows(27, s) and Follows(26, s) and Follows(25, s) and Follows(24, s) and Follows(23, s) and Follows(22, s) and Follows(21, s) and Follows(20, s) and Follows(12, s) and Follows(11, s) and Follows(13, s) and Follows(14, s) and Follows(15, s) and Follows(16, s) and Follows(17, s) and Follows(18, s) 
none
5000
3 - multi clause
stmt s; assign a;
Select s such that Follows*(440, s) pattern a("aaa", "2")
441, 442, 443, 444, 445, 446, 447, 448, 449, 450, 451, 452, 453, 454, 455, 456, 457, 458, 459, 460, 461, 462, 463, 464, 465, 466, 467, 468, 469, 470, 471, 472, 473, 474, 475, 476, 477, 478, 479, 480, 481, 482, 483, 484, 485, 486, 487, 488, 489, 490, 491, 492, 493, 494, 495, 496, 497, 498, 499, 500
5000
4 - while pattern
while w;
Select w pattern w("x", _)
58, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 80, 81
5000
5 - affects*
while w;
Select w such that Affects*(_, _)
58, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 76, 78, 80, 81, 195, 207, 213, 237, 286
5000
6 - affects* re run
while w;
Select w such that Affects*(_, _)
58, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 76, 78, 80, 81, 195, 207, 213, 237, 286
5000
7 - test Cache
while w; variable v; procedure p;
Select w such that Modifies(p, v) and Modifies("p", v) and Modifies(p, "v") and Modifies("p", "v")
none
5000
8 - test next and affects time
stmt a1, a2, a3;
Select <a1, a2, a3> such that Next(a1, a2) and Affects(a1, a2) and Affects(a2, a3) and Next(a2, a3)
132 133 134, 407 408 409
5000
9 - test next* time
stmt a1, a2, a3;
Select BOOLEAN such that Next*(a1, a2)
TRUE
5000
10 - test follows* time
stmt a1, a2, a3;
Select BOOLEAN such that Follows*(a1, a2)
TRUE
5000
11 - test affects* and next*
stmt s1, s2, s3;
Select s1 such that Next*(s1, s2) and Next*(s1, s3) and Affects*(s1, s2) and Next*(s2, s3) and Affects*(s2, s3)
100, 101, 105, 106, 107, 118, 119, 122, 123, 127, 128, 132, 204, 205, 206, 296, 297, 302, 407, 56, 57, 77, 79, 82, 84, 85, 86, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99
5000
12 - test Next* and Next
stmt s1, s2, s3;
Select s1 such that Next*(s1, s2) and Next*(s1, s3) and Next(s1, s3)
1 3 232 108 25 5 287 2 6 7 88 303 9 243 441 121 11 367 310 13 459 282 89 488 79 15 242 16 17 18 214 21 403 24 295 423 26 102 27 28 191 30 31 401 302 34 35 36 39 41 44 45 46 47 48 49 50 52 56 60 61 465 63 354 356 496 320 8 69 197 70 163 383 67 74 156 272 97 77 480 78 80 82 51 414 147 83 419 341 155 86 470 87 330 482 178 59 343 72 270 352 218 90 462 91 489 428 444 353 338 364 99 145 447 100 174 466 460 487 407 161 201 141 94 107 380 255 136 37 337 148 209 109 440 294 468 112 307 385 38 408 113 115 492 258 116 117 212 118 14 119 164 71 120 455 122 351 124 301 40 139 168 62 125 126 23 64 328 128 133 146 134 202 137 110 138 140 144 105 151 22 355 152 413 68 154 236 277 477 406 158 286 98 157 230 180 298 160 162 76 165 254 167 376 248 169 12 485 170 43 172 173 175 483 130 182 475 183 185 186 187 92 188 189 85 192 429 430 4 432 262 424 456 159 297 299 131 312 305 306 129 308 153 309 316 127 319 19 484 322 357 58 276 392 198 135 315 452 256 200 469 177 205 142 206 329 491 65 184 342 207 81 321 208 366 143 210 211 213 227 166 224 335 216 391 219 95 220 203 221 280 222 171 223 75 217 226 442 176 402 381 326 410 20 445 446 29 448 449 246 451 360 405 281 453 454 476 267 474 317 457 249 473 195 478 463 464 238 467 93 333 409 111 479 394 472 471 369 114 481 399 275 400 284 490 279 493 378 443 494 495 497 498 361 289 362 422 304 371 318 363 327 365 42 368 106 379 370 486 458 372 374 377 382 386 387 388 331 332 461 296 334 132 96 336 340 199 244 404 344 66 215 345 196 225 346 33 347 450 395 179 396 348 397 398 241 101 271 283 288 290 373 427 291 323 415 32 416 417 418 204 435 190 431 339 231 233 57 234 84 235 300 237 239 240 181 73 384 245 247 123 257 10 375 278 393 285
5000
13 - test Next* and Next
stmt s1, s2, s3;
Select s1 such that Next*(s1, s2) and Next*(s1, s3) and Next(s1, s2) and Next(s2, s3) and Next(s1, s2)
1 3 232 108 25 5 287 2 6 7 88 303 9 243 441 121 11 367 310 13 459 282 89 488 79 15 242 16 17 18 214 21 403 24 295 423 26 102 27 28 191 30 31 401 302 34 35 36 39 41 44 45 46 47 48 49 50 52 56 60 61 465 63 354 356 496 320 8 69 197 70 163 383 67 74 156 272 97 77 480 78 80 82 51 414 147 83 419 341 155 86 470 87 330 482 178 59 343 72 270 352 218 90 462 91 489 428 444 353 338 364 99 145 447 100 174 466 460 487 407 161 201 141 94 107 380 255 136 37 337 148 209 109 440 294 468 112 307 385 38 408 113 115 492 258 116 117 212 118 14 119 164 71 120 455 122 351 124 301 40 139 168 62 125 126 23 64 328 128 133 146 134 202 137 110 138 140 144 105 151 22 355 152 413 68 154 236 277 477 406 158 286 98 157 230 180 298 160 162 76 165 254 167 376 248 169 12 485 170 43 172 173 175 483 130 182 475 183 185 186 187 92 188 189 85 192 429 430 4 432 262 424 456 159 297 299 131 312 305 306 129 308 153 309 316 127 319 19 484 322 357 58 276 392 198 135 315 452 256 200 469 177 205 142 206 329 491 65 184 342 207 81 321 208 366 143 210 211 213 227 166 224 335 216 391 219 95 220 203 221 280 222 171 223 75 217 226 442 176 402 381 326 410 20 445 446 29 448 449 246 451 360 405 281 453 454 476 267 474 317 457 249 473 195 478 463 464 238 467 93 333 409 111 479 394 472 471 369 114 481 399 275 400 284 490 279 493 378 443 494 495 497 498 361 289 362 422 304 371 318 363 327 365 42 368 106 379 370 486 458 372 374 377 382 386 387 388 331 332 461 296 334 132 96 336 340 199 244 404 344 66 215 345 196 225 346 33 347 450 395 179 396 348 397 398 241 101 271 283 288 290 373 427 291 323 415 32 416 417 418 204 435 190 431 339 231 233 57 234 84 235 300 237 239 240 181 73 384 245 247 123 257 10 375 278 393 285
5000
